short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that allows you to export your Wealthsimple transactions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this browser extension you can easily export all of your wealth simple transactions to a csv file.

Simply open any of your accounts, go in "view all transactions" and then click the button in the extension
